title: My Only Stock In A Time-limited Life Has Collapsed - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Childhood Friends   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Limited Lifespan   Prison   Sickly Characters
author: Yoon Delico   윤델리코
description:
I was born with a body of uncertainty about when I would die.

A sunfish body born without the blessing that everyone else gets.

In order not to get into an accident or get sick and die, I need to find a man who can pour his energy into this poor body.

'This proposal, you'd better be prepared.'

My childhood friends interfered with my blind date. the two secret military powers of the country and the richest man and woman.

That too,

'Are you going on another blind date?'

This is dangerous.>
